I have been using the MeetGeek.ai web app for my online meetings for a while now, and I love being able to bring that technology to my in-person meetings as well. Recent updates have made the app easy to use. While I still take notes during meetings, I find that I am able to be more present and engaged knowing that I have a transcript and recording to refer back to when needed.

MeetGeek is a game-changer for my organization! It handles all meeting notes, task tracking, and follow-ups, so no one has to stop and take notes. The app lets me take MeetGeek to in-person meetings, just like in Zoom or Google Meet, recording and organizing everything. If you haven't downloaded the app yet, it's a must for staying organized and looking more professional in every meeting, both virtual and in-person. Highly recommend!
MeetGeek is the king of meeting recorders. I have used them since they first launched the product and it has been one of the best investments I've ever made for my business.
Easy to use, effective, and really helpful! Great for catching up on meetings.
I mainly use it to manage my scheduled meetings, which saves me tons of time since I have at least five calls a day. I love the MeetGeek web app, and now I‚Äôm a fan of their mobile app too!
Even the free version does almost everything I need, and I‚Äôm impressed with its accuracy. It‚Äôs not perfect, but I think it‚Äôll get the job done.
I would definitely recommend this app! The only downside is that it‚Äôs not as accurate with technical jargon as I‚Äôd like. But I think that‚Äôs more about the overall stage of AI technologies today

Notewise Cloud will DELETE YOUR LOCAL COPIES once your subscription expires. Doesn't matter if they were saved locally on your device, Notewise will go ahead and delete everything. Please fix language detection, explain templates in-app, and add a preview/edit step before generating. Recommend using manual mode for now. Thanks!
